General.Name: YC Inox Co Ltd
General.Description: YC Inox Co.,Ltd produces, processes, and trades in stainless steel products in Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It offers stainless steel coils, sheets, plates, pipes, tubes, angles, flat bars, plates, and U channel products. The company was formerly known as Yeun Chyang Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YC Inox Co., Ltd. in July 2012. YC Inox Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.
